actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the defense of judges and judicial officers sued in their official capacities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts, in accordance with such regulations as he may prescribe and are approved by the Judicial Conference of the United States, to pay the defense costs of a judge or Federal court employee who is sued for acts performed or omissions made in his official capacity.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the defense of judges and judicial officers sued in their official capacities.
